109 Glenn Beck exposes how Muslims are getting around the US Fair Housing Act and making Muslim only communities in America posted 3 hours ago by perma-maga 16 comments award share report block Wall Street Apes @WallStreetApes • 2d Glenn Beck exposes how Muslims are getting around the US Fair Housing Act and making Muslim only communities in America ‌ Muslim Developers are creating communities and then they create a monthly fee for all the homes, “75% of the service fee you're paying goes to the masjid — so
16 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Elon Reveals the Real Reason He Walks Away From Trump Read More Ads by Ad.Style Lol_Garrus 3 points 1 hour ago Christian Whites should do the same. Leftists ballanized America along ethnic lines. The old rules don't matter anymore. Play and beat them at their own game. permalink award report block reply blitzstrasse 3 points 1 hour ago Allow me to offer an elegant solution: arson, using the politicians who allowed it to happen as fuel. permalink award report block reply South_Florida_Guy 1 points 2 hours ago Is he going to talk about the jewish only enclaves and compounds or entire towns like Lakewood, NJ? permalink award report block reply perma-maga OP 2 points 1 hour ago I'm not familiar with Lakewood, please elaborate. permalink parent award report block reply South_Florida_Guy 0 points 60 minutes ago Orthodox jews basically bought the entire town house by house, driving out the former owners by driving the property values down until they converted the entire down into one giant orthodox jewish compound permalink parent award report block reply perma-maga OP 1 points 50 minutes ago Thanks. Are fees levied to fund a synagogue? permalink parent award report block reply South_Florida_Guy 0 points 47 minutes ago Not sure but however they accomplished it, everyone was on board so I'm sure they did some kind of slimy, sneaky crap to make it happen one way or the other, and that's aside from purposely driving the values down to run everyone that wasn't them out of town. permalink parent award report block reply view 3 more comments... perma-maga OP 1 points 1 hour ago One of the comments in the twitter thread referenced Ave Maria, Florida. Governing documents are the Declaration of Covenants made by Ave Maria Development, LLLP https://app.collierclerk.com/CORPublicAccess/Document/View/4337949 The Ave Maria Development created the Ave Maria Stewardship District. The Ave Maria Stewardship Community District (AMSCD) is a limited, single, and special-purpose independent local government, created to provide community development systems, facilities, services, projects, improvements, and infrastructure within the Ave Maria Community.  This may include, without limitation, recreational facilities, water management and control facilities, reclamation and reuse, a combination thereof, water and sewer systems, wastewater management, irrigation, streets and roadways, bridges, culverts, street lighting and related facilities, transportation, conservation areas, mitigation areas, wildlife habitat facilities, control of mosquitoes and other arthropods, parks and indoor and outdoor recreation, cultural and education facilities, waste collection and disposal, fire prevention and control, and security (collectively, the "infrastructure"). https://avemariamasterassociation.com/page/37146~1063089/associations I've reviewed the Declaration and found nothing regarding funding any religious entity, building, etc. permalink parent award report block reply South_Florida_Guy 0 points 1 hour ago Ave Maria is a mostly Catholic development based around the Ave Maria Catholic University there that was built and planned by one of the co founders of Domino's Pizza, being as though he is a very devout Catholic and that's what he wanted to do with his money. While "mostly" Catholic it's become pretty much a large majority conservative Christian town permalink parent award report block reply perma-maga OP 1 points 1 hour ago There is no fee assessed to fund a church. permalink parent award report block reply South_Florida_Guy 0 points 54 minutes ago Yes, I know, but I am in favor of what amounts to large Christian (and White) only enclaves only (even if Catholic, too, which I am not one of) but opposed to the muzzie and jew or any others because America is a CHRISTIAN nation and I'm never going to pretend it isn't. permalink parent award report block reply TrumpYouMagaFrenner -2 points 2 hours ago MuH jEwS stfu permalink parent award report block reply SCHULTZ 1 points 1 hour ago Comment removed by community moderators. permalink award report block reply
